TopicTitle: Does the ore harvester need to keep moving around?

Articles.Content: Will the ore harvesters need to move around frequently to extract the ore from an area or does it stay in place and suck in the ore from the surrounding area?

I think they extract ore in a radius, but as I have not tested the mining mechanic for that, I'm not 100% sure.

It wouldn't hurt to probably strap on some rockets to allow to change places.
I know asteroids have limited fuel, but i believe planets have infinite with just diminishing returns after some time, so yes moving is useful, but might not be 100% essential.
